knative.Condition.description: Conditions defines a readiness condition for a Knative resource. See: https://github.com/kubernetes/community/blob/master/contributors/devel/api-conventions.md#typical-status-properties

lastTransitionTime.description: LastTransitionTime is the last time the condition transitioned from one status to another. We use VolatileTime in place of metav1.Time to exclude this from creating equality.Semantic differences (all other things held constant).

message.description: A human readable message indicating details about the transition.

reason.description: The reason for the condition's last transition.

severity.description: Severity with which to treat failures of this type of condition. When this is not specified, it defaults to Error.

status.description: Status of the condition, one of True, False, Unknown.

v1alpha2.AlibiExplainerSpec.description: AlibiExplainerSpec defines the arguments for configuring an Alibi Explanation Server

config.description: Inline custom parameter settings for explainer

resources.description: Defaults to requests and limits of 1CPU, 2Gb MEM.

storageUri.description: The location of a trained explanation model

v1alpha2.CustomSpec.description: CustomSpec provides a hook for arbitrary container configuration.

v1alpha2.DeploymentSpec.description: DeploymentSpec defines the configuration for a given KFService service component

maxReplicas.description: This is the up bound for autoscaler to scale to

minReplicas.description: Minimum number of replicas, pods won't scale down to 0 in case of no traffic

serviceAccountName.description: ServiceAccountName is the name of the ServiceAccount to use to run the service

explainer.description: Explainer defines the model explanation service spec explainer service calls to transformer or predictor service

predictor.description: Predictor defines the model serving spec

transformer.description: Transformer defines the transformer service spec for pre/post processing transformer service calls to predictor service

v1alpha2.ExplainerSpec.description: ExplainerSpec defines the arguments for a model explanation server

alibi.description: The following fields follow a "1-of" semantic. Users must specify exactly one spec.

maxReplicas.description: This is the up bound for autoscaler to scale to

minReplicas.description: Minimum number of replicas, pods won't scale down to 0 in case of no traffic

serviceAccountName.description: ServiceAccountName is the name of the ServiceAccount to use to run the service

v1alpha2.KFService.description: KFService is the Schema for the services API

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

v1alpha2.KFServiceList.description: KFServiceList contains a list of Service

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

v1alpha2.KFServiceSpec.description: KFServiceSpec defines the desired state of KFService

canary.description: Canary defines an alternate endpoints to route a percentage of traffic.

canaryTrafficPercent.description: CanaryTrafficPercent defines the percentage of traffic going to canary KFService endpoints

v1alpha2.KFServiceStatus.description: KFServiceStatus defines the observed state of KFService

conditions.description: Conditions the latest available observations of a resource's current state.

observedGeneration.description: ObservedGeneration is the 'Generation' of the Service that was last processed by the controller.

v1alpha2.ONNXSpec.description: ONNXSpec defines arguments for configuring ONNX model serving.

resources.description: Defaults to requests and limits of 1CPU, 2Gb MEM.

storageUri.description: The location of the trained model

v1alpha2.PredictorSpec.description: PredictorSpec defines the configuration to route traffic to a predictor.

custom.description: The following fields follow a "1-of" semantic. Users must specify exactly one spec.

maxReplicas.description: This is the up bound for autoscaler to scale to

minReplicas.description: Minimum number of replicas, pods won't scale down to 0 in case of no traffic

serviceAccountName.description: ServiceAccountName is the name of the ServiceAccount to use to run the service

v1alpha2.PyTorchSpec.description: PyTorchSpec defines arguments for configuring PyTorch model serving.

modelClassName.description: Defaults PyTorch model class name to 'PyTorchModel'

resources.description: Defaults to requests and limits of 1CPU, 2Gb MEM.

storageUri.description: The location of the trained model

v1alpha2.StatusConfigurationSpec.description: StatusConfigurationSpec describes the state of the configuration receiving traffic.
